product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner showcases a delicate and elegant jewelry product featuring a central product image (`product_image`) of rose gold wreath stud earrings. The background incorporates soft, overlapping abstract shapes and gradient arcs, creating a dreamy pastel aesthetic using soft pink and peach tones. The heading text (`heading`) is bold and prominent, announcing the jewelry theme, while the subheading (`subheading`) offers a subtle and refined description of the product. A clear and bold price display (`price`) stands out near the bottom, situated above a contrasting rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with white text (`cta`) prompting the viewer to shop now.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Rose Pink: `#FFD0D0`
- Blush Peach: `#FFCAB0`
- Dusty Rose: `#D16B70`
- Deep Mauve: `#B25E68`
- Accent Pink: `#FFC0CB`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image showcases a pair of floral-themed earrings, where the color palette beautifully blends elegance and femininity. The dominant hue is a soft rose gold (#EFA2A2), used for the metal frame and floral detailing, conveying warmth and luxury. Accentuating this are marquise and round-cut crystals rendered in brilliant white (#FFFFFF) and translucent ice (#D8F0F7), adding sparkle and contrast. A subtle blush pink (#F7C5C0) fills the petal-shaped inlay, offering a gentle pop of color. The interplay of warm rose tones with cool crystal highlights creates a cohesive yet eye-catching aesthetic, perfect for a modern, sophisticated advertisement banner.
